
# SlimIDP

SlimIDP is a Nodejs Express application that is capable of accepting a `POST`(login) and responding with a valid SAML 2.0 Response

```html
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Working...</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <form method="post" name="hiddenform" action="http://cloud.malwarebytes.localhost/sso/acs/60d191ca-9fe8-4202-a24f-12341d7e9541">
            <input type="hidden"
               name="SAMLResponse"
               value="">
            <input type="hidden" name="RelayState" value="">
            <noscript>
                <p>
                Script is disabled. Click Submit to continue.
            </p>
                <input type="submit" value="Submit">

            </noscript>
        </form>
        <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
        window.setTimeout(function(){document.forms[0].submit();}, 0);
    </script>
    </body>
</html>
```
